fields.description: I noticed that a while loop is used here to avoid spurious wakeups. I think we should calculate the total sleep time to prevent it from exceeding requestTimeout too much in case of spurious wakeups and the server not responding for a long time.
fields.summary: When a spurious wakeup occurs, the clients waiting time may exceed requestTimeout.
